nodes.text: The Republic rescue fleet was a fleet of the Galactic Republic that was active during the High Republic Era. Following the Great Hyperspace Disaster, the Nihil pirate group conducted an attack on Trymant IV during an Emergence. As a consequence of the events, the Republic rescue fleet, consisting of a medical frigate, a Pelta-class frigate, and at least nine Jedi Vectors, were deployed to the Trymant system, where they began a blockade against the Nihil's Spider Cruiser. The fleet suffered casualties when the Spider Cruiser attacked, critically damaging the medical frigate and destroying a Vector.
